mapper.sql: alarm_id, alarm_title, alarm_time, alarm_code_id, alarm_status, scene_id, workorder_id, monitor_type, origin
mapper.select: select DISTINCT scene_name from alarm_info,alarm_scene WHERE alarm_info.alarm_id=alarm_scene.scene_id
select DISTINCT alarm_code_name from alarm_info,alarm_code WHERE alarm_code.alarm_code_id=alarm_info.alarm_code_id

select alarm_info.origin, alarm_info.monitor_type, alarm_info.alarm_code_id, alarm_info.alarm_id, alarm_info.alarm_status, alarm_info.alarm_time,alarm_scene.scene_name,alarm_code.alarm_code_name, alarm_info.alarm_title ,alarm_code.`level` from alarm_info,alarm_code,alarm_scene WHERE alarm_code.alarm_code_id=alarm_info.alarm_code_id and alarm_info.scene_id=alarm_scene.scene_id and alarm_info.origin like ("%"+#{origin}+"%") and alarm_scene.scene_name like ("%"+#{scene_name}+"%") and alarm_code.alarm_code_name like ("%"+#{alarm_code_name}+"%") and alarm_info.alarm_status=#{alarm_status} and alarm_code.`level`=#{level};

select
distinct
from alarm_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into alarm_info
alarm_id,
alarm_title,
alarm_time,
alarm_code_id,
alarm_status,
scene_id,
workorder_id,
monitor_type,
origin,
#{alarm_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarm_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarm_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{alarm_code_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarm_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scene_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{workorder_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{monitor_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update alarm_info
alarm_id = #{record.alarm_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_title = #{record.alarm_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_time = #{record.alarm_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
alarm_code_id = #{record.alarm_code_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_status = #{record.alarm_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scene_id = #{record.scene_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workorder_id = #{record.workorder_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
monitor_type = #{record.monitor_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
origin = #{record.origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update alarm_info set alarm_id = #{record.alarm_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_title = #{record.alarm_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_time = #{record.alarm_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, alarm_code_id = #{record.alarm_code_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_status = #{record.alarm_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scene_id = #{record.scene_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workorder_id = #{record.workorder_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monitor_type = #{record.monitor_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin = #{record.origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update alarm_info
alarm_title = #{alarm_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_time = #{alarm_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
alarm_code_id = #{alarm_code_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_status = #{alarm_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scene_id = #{scene_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workorder_id = #{workorder_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
monitor_type = #{monitor_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
origin = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where alarm_id = #{alarm_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update alarm_info set alarm_title = #{alarm_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_time = #{alarm_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, alarm_code_id = #{alarm_code_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_status = #{alarm_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scene_id = #{scene_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workorder_id = #{workorder_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monitor_type = #{monitor_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where alarm_id = #{alarm_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
